titles.title: Veterans Homecare Choice Act of 2025
Veterans Homecare Choice Act of 2025
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to recognize nurse registries for purposes of the Veterans Community Care Program, and for other purposes.
